overview: A moment in the life and work of Alan Salvador García López, a recently graduated vocation career nurse, originally from Zacapu, Michoacán, who on Sundays performs a ritual that transforms and transports him to his personal nirvana, which is ultimate fighting. Also, his perspective on life, his love for his family, and his path to self-esteem and maturity.
title: El camino del Pancracio
